mainText:
Steve Jobs was definitely one-of-a-kind man. I am very grateful for have been born in this time of scientific and technical advances, but the world would be very different if we had had only one choice to access information technology, without the elegance, innovation and customer-oriented approach of Apple. The brilliant ideas of Steve will be always in our minds.
God bless Steve Jobs.
header: The brilliant elegance of Steve Jobs' innovations
author: Luis
